It doesn't hide the artist's work, it only covers it so it can still be found.

You guys realize if you hate this artists work so much, you can put 

-"Ozaki Akira" in the search bar and his work wont show up right?

for example

english -"Ozaki Akira" 

will bring up all english translated doujins except the ones done by this guy. either do that, dont click it, or stop bitching.
